summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the City Comptroller to conduct fiscal audits of Library, Municipal Court, and City pension system records and public works contracts; providing for follow-up of audit reports; requiring that City computerized fiscal records and equipment be satisfactory to the City Comptroller for auditing purposes; and adding new sections 3.95.060, 3.95.070, 20.48.080, and 20.52.060 to the Seattle Municipal Code.
